One iteration of sampling costs t = 0.00019257742643356322 s
Hence, maximal frequency f = 1 / t = 5192.71661 Hz = 5.1927166 kHz

One iteration of sampling costs t = 0.00014917554914951325 s
Hence, maximal frequency f = 1 / t = 6703.51144 Hz = 6.70351144 kHz

t1 = 52.1 C
t2 = 59.9 C
dt = 7.8 C
